articles.author: Luis Yordan, Sophie Garnett
articles.title: Parents of girl bullied online react to social media ban - CNN
articles.description: The parents of Charlotte O’Brien, a teenager who took her own life after online bullying, have spoken out in favor of Australia’s social media ban for under 16s. Charlotte’s funeral, which was held last month, drew attention to the impact online bullying can …
